name: Aquarius Lander
description:
Aquarius Lander is an attempt to adapt the famous game Lunar Lander for Mattel Aquarius.

This game is developed as part of the Retro Programers United for Obscure Systems game jam.

Given the technical constraints of this machine, which does not have a graphical mode as such, the experience is limited. This game is currently under development, but you will find a first release to try, which is 90% assembly and 10% basic, functional but without sound. I am gradually finishing the conversion to obtain a 100% assembly game. Please be indulgent, three months ago I had never coded a single line of Z80 assembly, and I did not even know about the existence of the Mattel Aquarius :)
